div.a: SCHOOL CLOSED FOR REMAINDER OF SCHOOL YEAR. DISTANCE LEARNING WILL CONTINUE. CHECK BELOW FOR UPDATES AS THEY OCCUR.

font.font: ~ Effectively immediately, the SAU office is closed to all visitors.

br.font: ~ We are not worrying about attendance during the quarantine.

span.font: ~ Online learning is up and running. If you are having trouble accessing the activities, reach out to your child's teachers. We will be reaching out to families at the end of the week who haven’t connected yet. Thank you for all you’re doing!
